sentences.sentence: Breezes set halyards from the nearby marina clanking against metal masts.
sentences.translation: 微风轻拂，附近的游艇码头传来升降索撞击金属桅杆的叮当声。

sentences.sentence: More standing rigging (shrouds and stays) and running rigging (halyards and sheets) to manage and maintain.
sentences.translation: 更多需要管理和索具和帆缆(包括侧支索shrounds，拉线stays，升帆索halyards，帆脚索sheets)。
